TheAim: The aim of this app is to help you focus on any task you are working on, such as study, coding, or writing. This app is inspired by
WhichIs: which is a time management method developed by Francesco Cirillo
ThePomodoroTechnique: The Pomodoro Technique is created for a more productive way to work and study. It uses atimer to break down work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separatedby short breaks.
